headline: Assessing United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS) Valuation As Mixed Returns Follow Recent Efficiency Reimagined Overhaul
summary: UPS stock performance snapshot United Parcel Service (UPS) shares have moved unevenly in recent periods, with a modest decline over the past week but a gain over the past month and past 3 months. For investors watching the stock, recent returns sit against a backdrop of annual revenue of about US$89.5b and net income of roughly US$5.5b, alongside a current share price near US$106.91. See our latest analysis for United Parcel Service. Recent trading has been mixed, with a 21.41% 3 month share...
